A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Seriously\, where are the plot holes these hater drones keep talking about? I'll save you the time. There's are not plot inconsistencies in The Last Jedi. This is one of the better Star Wars films\, but let's not pretend than any of them are Citizen Kane. For a Star Wars film though this is easily the best written one I can remember. Perhaps that's why some people are still screaming about it six months later.
